title: Sour Dough
description: Thade confessed his supplier was operating out of the Market Ward's under-cellars. You must shut down the distribution ring tying the Bakery to the Void-Wine cartel.

turns.narrative: The cellars are heavily guarded by cartel thugs. They are loading crates of glowing blue flour.
turns.choice_a: Use fire magic to ignite the flour dust in the air
turns.consequence_a: A massive thermobaric explosion wipes out the guards, but collapses half the cellar.
turns.choice_b: Assassinate them one by one from the shadows
turns.consequence_b: You clear the room surgically. The flour and the ledgers remain intact.

turns.narrative: The 'Dough-Master', a heavily mutated rogue alchemist, emerges from his lab.
turns.consequence_a: He breathes toxic dough-spores at close range. You kill him but take heavy poison damage.
turns.choice_b: Kite him around the cellar using ranged attacks
turns.consequence_b: A slow but safe victory. You pepper him with arrows until he collapses.

cellar_exploded.description: You blew up the cellar, ending the cartel's operation violently.

cellar_intact.description: You cleared the cellar and recovered the cartel's ledgers.

conclusion: You blew up the cellar, ending the cartel's operation violently.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with significant consequences to the district and involved factions.
